PASSWORD_RESET.title: Password Reset Request
PASSWORD_RESET.message: You have requested to reset your password. Click to proceed.

PHONE_VERIFIED.title: Phone Verified
PHONE_VERIFIED.message: Your phone number {phone} has been successfully verified.

CENTER_CREATED.title: Center Created Successfully
CENTER_CREATED.message: Your center {centerName} has been successfully created! You can now start managing your center.

CENTER_UPDATED.title: Center Information Updated
CENTER_UPDATED.message: Your center {centerName} information has been successfully updated.

OWNERS.title: New Branch
OWNERS.message: Branch {branchName} at center {centerName} has been created by {actorName}.

STAFF.title: New Branch
STAFF.message: Branch {branchName} at center {centerName} has been created.

OWNERS.title: Branch Updated
OWNERS.message: Branch {branchName} at center {centerName} has been updated by {actorName}.

STAFF.title: Branch Updated
STAFF.message: Branch {branchName} at center {centerName} has been updated.

OWNERS.title: Branch Deleted

STAFF.title: Branch Deleted
STAFF.message: Branch {branchName} at center {centerName} has been deleted.

OWNERS.title: Branch Restored
OWNERS.message: Branch {branchName} at center {centerName} has been restored by {actorName}.

STAFF.title: Branch Restored
STAFF.message: Branch {branchName} at center {centerName} has been restored.

TARGET.title: Absence Recorded
TARGET.message: Your absence from session {className} - {groupName} at {centerName} has been recorded.

PARENTS.title: Your Child Absent
PARENTS.message: Alert: {studentName} was marked absent from session {className} - {groupName} at {centerName}.

PASSWORD_CHANGED.title: Password Changed
PASSWORD_CHANGED.message: Your password has been changed successfully

LOGIN_FAILED.title: Failed Login Attempt
LOGIN_FAILED.message: A failed login attempt was detected on your account

TWO_FA_DISABLED.title: Two-Factor Authentication Disabled
TWO_FA_DISABLED.message: Warning: Two-factor authentication has been disabled on your account

TARGET.title: Center Access Activated
TARGET.message: Welcome! Your access to {centerName} has been activated. You can now start working.

OWNERS.title: Alert: User Access Activated
OWNERS.message: User {name} access to {centerName} has been activated by {actorName}.

TARGET.title: Center Access Deactivated
TARGET.message: Alert: Your access to {centerName} has been deactivated. Please contact administration for more details.

OWNERS.title: Security Alert: User Access Deactivated
OWNERS.message: User {name} access to {centerName} has been deactivated by {actorName}.

TARGET.title: Center Access Granted
TARGET.message: Welcome to the {centerName} team! Your access has been activated. You can now start working.

OWNERS.title: Security Alert: New Access Granted
OWNERS.message: {profileType} access has been granted to user {name} by {actorName} in {centerName}.

TARGET.title: Center Access Revoked
TARGET.message: Alert: Your access to {centerName} has been modified. Please contact administration for more details.

OWNERS.title: Security Alert: Access Revoked
OWNERS.message: {profileType} access has been revoked from user {name} by {actorName} in {centerName}.

TARGET.title: Role Assigned
TARGET.message: You have been assigned the {roleName} role in {centerName}

OWNERS.title: New Role Assigned
OWNERS.message: The {roleName} role has been assigned to user {name} by {actorName} in {centerName}.

TARGET.title: Role Revoked
TARGET.message: The {roleName} role has been revoked from your account in {centerName}

OWNERS.title: Role Revoked
OWNERS.message: The {roleName} role has been revoked from user {name} by {actorName} in {centerName}.

TEACHER.message: Session {sessionTitle} - {className} scheduled for {startTime} has been canceled

PARENTS.title: Your Child's Session Ended
